hotelchain

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BridalSuite

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents of a room in a hotel with a certain room number Implements Serializable so instances can be stored using the FileHandler class.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
